content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to EPAM Resource Development Center!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9e1a9704-2600-4e06-a207-6b51e5ffdd5f/RD%20Logo.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":218,\"height\":209.00000000000003}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are welcome to review General Company Overview Presentation one more time:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/98aad75d-f112-4a8a-8d81-0070a8aba272/Global_Onboarding.pdf?preview=true\",\"style\":{\"height\":\"800px\"}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the next few months, you will have a great opportunity to become a specialist in the field you choose: QA, Front-End Development, Java, DB/BusinessIntelligence, ASP.NET, DevOps.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"But first, let's get acquainted.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Lab-Lead is your Resource Manager and your trusted advisor and helper during your Pre-production period. Feel free to ask any questions regarding your being a part of our EPAM team. Your Lab-Lead will provide you log in details to enter the system for the first time. Log in and change your password.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can find information on programs' Lab-Leads at the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/RDTC/RD+Ukraine\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please familiarize yourself with the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/#/selfAssign/4be322b5-b91e-4cea-89f6-8175f8092fbd\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Labor Safety and Fire Prevention Training\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". If you have any questions, please address them to your Lab-Lead or your HR representative\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
